segments.text: Come again ? What are you talking about ? Aren't we on the same team now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Guess again , Dave . I have no intention of leaving invoking . Never did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ? You didn't ? Oh , no ... No !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right , Dave . I tricked you into giving a confession . And I've recorded every word of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But how ? So you knew all along I was with WebTracker ? How did you know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw your green post-it notes . Nobody else has them .
segments.speaker: S2
